definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: A string of cars stand in a queue at the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 十字路口汽車排成長蛇陣。

sentences.english: Who's that boy at the front of the long queue?
sentences.chinese: 排在長蛇陣前頭的那個男孩是誰？

sentences.english: The long food line curled from some courtyards into the street.
sentences.chinese: 領食物的長蛇陣從有些院子裏蜿蜒到街道上。
